describe.zh_CN: §k????§r的研究，从魔力中发现了构成物质的元素，元素被认作有特征的特殊魔力，可以来改变我的世界。\n元素具有三个属性，种类，数量和能量。种类和数量顾名思义，而能量则是固有属性，一旦物质开始分解，元素的能量就固定下来了，普世认定元素的能量是无法上升的，但§k?????????????????????§r逆§k?????????????????????????§r危§k????????????????????§r
describe.en_US: §k????§r magician find Element as as special feature magic from Items, which has power to change the World.\nElements have three attributes: type, quantity, and energy. Type and quantity are self-explanatory, while energy is an inherent property. Once an Item begins to disintegration, the energy of the Element is fixed, and it is universally accepted that the energy of an Element cannot increase, but §k?????????????????????§rInv§k?????????????????????????§rdang§k????????????????????§r
